On Tue, Jun 12, 2007 at 04:34:39PM -0400, Mike Schinkel wrote:
> Paul Winkler
> > Reading the docs at http://activemq.apache.org/ I noticed 
> > they have a REST API.  So I clicked on 
> > http://activemq.apache.org/rest.html to read more and, 
> > perhaps not surprisingly, found that it's pretty broken REST.
> 
> Rather ironic given Roy Fielding's high profile role related to Apache...

The Apache project does a lot of things besides the excellent http
server. Judging by their java xmlrpc client library, not all things
under the Apache umbrella are good.  (If you need an xmlrpc client for
java, try Redstone instead.)

-- 

Paul Winkler
http://www.slinkp.com
